statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_tracking;
SELECT id, employee_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_tracking;
SELECT * FROM compliance_tracking WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT id, policy_id, date_entered FROM compliance_tracking WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM compliance_tracking ORDER BY compliance_status DESC, date_entered ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_tracking WHERE compliance_status = 'Not Compliant';
SELECT employee_id, policy_id, date_entered FROM compliance_tracking WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY date_entered DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM compliance_tracking WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT employee_id, policy_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_tracking WHERE date_entered BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM compliance_tracking WHERE DATE(date_entered) = '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceData;
SELECT employee_id, policy_name FROM ComplianceData WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT policy_name, employee_id FROM ComplianceData ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(id) AS Total_Compliance_Count FROM ComplianceData GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM PolicyRecords WHERE last_updated_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceData WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM ComplianceData GROUP BY policy_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM PolicyRecords WHERE last_updated_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT(policy_name) FROM ComplianceData ORDER BY policy_name;
SELECT record_id, policy_name, description FROM PolicyRecords WHERE description LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Policy;
SELECT policy_name, description FROM Policy WHERE id = 1;
SELECT department, compliance_status FROM Compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT regulation_name, entered_date FROM Regulation ORDER BY entered_date DESC;
SELECT id, policy_name, created_at FROM Policy WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Policy ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, policy_name, created_at FROM Policy WHERE policy_name LIKE 'General%' AND created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT Policy.policy_name, Compliance.compliance_status FROM Policy INNER JOIN Compliance ON Policy.id = Compliance.policy_id WHERE Compliance.compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT Regulation.regulation_name, Regulation.entered_date FROM Regulation WHERE entered_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY entered_date DESC;
SELECT Policy.id, Compliance.compliance_status, Policy.policy_name, Compliance.department FROM Policy LEFT JOIN Compliance ON Policy.id = Compliance.policy_id WHERE Compliance.department IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM compliance_entries ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, employee_id FROM compliance_entries WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT policy_name, category FROM policies WHERE category = 'Security';
SELECT full_name, job_title FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM compliance_entries ORDER BY date DESC, policy_name ASC;
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) FROM compliance_entries GROUP BY policy_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT full_name, job_title, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY full_name;

SELECT ce.policy_name, p.description, e.full_name FROM compliance_entries ce JOIN policies p ON ce.policy_name = p.policy_name JOIN employees e ON ce.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE ce.date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT d.department_name, d.location, COUNT(e.employee_id) as total_employees FROM departments d LEFT JOIN employees e ON d.department_id = e.department GROUP BY d.department_name, d.location ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policy;
SELECT policy_name, policy_category FROM Policy WHERE policy_category = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecord WHERE compliance_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT dept_id, dept_name FROM Department ORDER BY dept_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, policy_category FROM Policy WHERE policy_category = 'Finance';
SELECT employee_name, employee_dept, hire_date FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description, date_created FROM Policy WHERE date_created < '2019-01-01';
SELECT Employee.employee_name, Department.dept_name FROM Employee JOIN Department ON Employee.employee_dept = Department.dept_name;
